dits.title: TypeMismatch, [] value assigned to String
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 19 (tests/fail.dit)
Str test = ['cat'];
                  ^

TypeMismatchError: Cannot assign listOf ? to Str

dits.title: TypeMismatch, '' value assigned to List
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 24 (tests/fail.dit)
listOf Str test = 'cat';
                       ^

TypeMismatchError: Cannot assign Str to listOf Str

dits.title: TypeMismatch, Str var assigned to List
dits.dit:
Str test = 'cat';
listOf Str test2 = test;
dits.expected:
Line: 2 Col: 24 (tests/fail.dit)
listOf Str test2 = test;
                       ^

TypeMismatchError: Cannot assign Str to listOf Str

dits.title: TypeMismatch, List var assigned to String
dits.dit:
listOf Str test = ['cat'];
Str test2 = test;
dits.expected:
Line: 2 Col: 17 (tests/fail.dit)
Str test2 = test;
                ^

TypeMismatchError: Cannot assign listOf Str to Str

dits.title: TypeMismatch, '' assigned to class
dits.expected:
Line: 2 Col: 10 (tests/fail.dit)
A = 'dog';
         ^

TypeMismatchError: Cannot assign Str to Class

dits.title: TypeMismatch, Str var assigned to class
dits.expected:
Line: 3 Col: 9 (tests/fail.dit)
A = test;
        ^

TypeMismatchError: Cannot assign Str to Class

dits.title: TypeMismatch, '' assigned to dit
dits.expected:
Line: 2 Col: 12 (tests/fail.dit)
dit = 'dog';
           ^

TypeMismatchError: Cannot assign Str to Dit

dits.title: TypeMismatch, Str var assigned to dit
dits.expected:
Line: 3 Col: 11 (tests/fail.dit)
dit = test;
          ^

TypeMismatchError: Cannot assign Str to Dit

dits.title: TypeMismatch, listOf Str had class
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 32 (tests/fail.dit)
listOf Str value = [class {||}];
                               ^

TypeMismatchError: List of type 'Str' contained 'Class'

dits.title: TypeMismatch, listOf Class had string
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 29 (tests/fail.dit)
listOf Class value = ['dog'];
                            ^

TypeMismatchError: List of type 'Class' contained 'Str'

dits.title: TypeMismatch, func call, List instead of String
dits.expected:
Line: 2 Col: 5 (tests/fail.dit)
    return ['cat'];
    ^

TypeMismatchError: Expected 'Str' for return, got 'listOf ?'
	at test1 (tests/fail.dit):4:13

dits.title: TypeMismatch, func call, Class instead of String
dits.expected:
Line: 2 Col: 5 (tests/fail.dit)
    return class {||};
    ^

TypeMismatchError: Expected 'Str' for return, got 'Class'
	at test1 (tests/fail.dit):4:13
